title: Education & Training
subtitle: Academic qualifications and internationally recognized safety certifications.

education.institution: Federal Urdu University of Arts, Science & Technology (FUUAST)
details: Studied software engineering, databases, and computer systems.
Focused on modern web development and automation concepts.
Completed one-year training focused on React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Developed multiple real-world web projects with responsive UI.
Holds NEBOSH IGC, IOSH Managing Safely, OSHA Safety & Health, Fire Safety, and Risk Assessment certifications.
Integrated digital systems with safety and compliance automation.
